person.persName: Jesse P. Close (Green County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Gabriel Close and Morach Close. Married to Arena Noe Close in Green County, Kentucky, on September 1, 1847. Father of Isa G. Close, Marona E. Close, William G. Close, James E. Close, and Malissa J. Close. Laborer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.
